item.description:
Amit is going to be hosting this event. It will be at his apartment in Rocky Hill. (not Middletown as previously listed) We will be e-mailing out the address to those who have rsvp'd yes, closer to the date.

Space is limited, so please make sure you WILL attend or change your RSVP in a timely manner if you cannot. RSVPS will be shut down 2 days before event for proper planning.

List of seen movies seen so far:
Saawariya
Bhoot
Hum Tum

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Bollywood Potluck **Different Day**
